Name: Immortal Bloom - Rare
Description: After defeating the corresponding boss monster in the wild or in the Stimen Vaults, opening the loot has a chance to obtain it. It is an exquisite material mainly used for crafting "Ultimate" type Battle Imagine.
Description2$english: An unbloomed bud, but precisely because of its incomplete state, it harbors countless possibilities. Perhaps it was forgotten during its growth, or perhaps it is waiting for the dewdrop to awaken it.
